structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
State Superintendent Of Buildings, And State House

law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 139, Sec. 14 effective October 31, 2012. See 2012, 139, Sec. 219.] Notwithstanding any general or special law or rule or regulation to the contrary, the superintendent, or employees designated by the superintendent, may make purchases if the amount involved will not exceed $1,000.
